Santa Clause.color: I grew up with a lot of white. Although I have a great fondness for the emptiness of color, I was ecstatic with the color of your blood as it creeped into the depths of the earth beneath the white canvas.
Santa Clause.food: You know, I used to hate cookies. Always out of reach, always out of sight. Forced into grueling ninja training since I could walk, I've never really appreciated my skills. That is until I got into the cookie stealing business.
Santa Clause.hobbies: Scaling chimneys and stealing cookies. They make it so easy. It's like they want me to steal it leaving it out there unguarded with unseen eyes.
Santa Clause.bio: Imagine a jolly ninja, sneaking through chimneys with the stealth of a cat on caffeine. His belly jiggles like a bowl of jelly in an earthquake, and his laugh is a symphony of ho-hos that wakes the dead but somehow... keeps the kids snoozing. This red-suited legend zooms across the globe faster than flash leaving trails of cookie crumbs and festive chaos. Be warned, once in a blue moon, cookies aren't enough.
